Package com.vaadin.addon.calendar.event

Interface Summary
CalendarEvent Event in the calendar.
CalendarEvent.EventChangeListener Listener for EventSetChange events.
CalendarEvent.EventChangeNotifier Notifier interface for EventChange events.
CalendarEventEditor Extension to the basic CalendarEvent.
CalendarEventProvider Interface for querying events.
CalendarEventProvider.EventSetChangeListener Listener for EventSetChange events.
CalendarEventProvider.EventSetChangeNotifier Notifier interface for EventSetChange events.
 

Class Summary
BasicEvent Simple implementation of CalendarEvent.
BasicEventProvider Simple implementation of CalendarEventProvider.
CalendarEvent.EventChange Event to signal that an event has changed.
CalendarEventProvider.EventSetChange Event to signal that the set of events has changed and the calendar should refresh its view from the CalendarEventProvider .
